1984-08-03.lead_paragraph: Armco Inc. said it would shut its only operating open hearth furnace on Nov. 3, affecting about 250 employees. Armco officials said that about 100 employees would be moved to other areas of the company's Middletown Works steel plant. The others will be placed on ''labor reserve'' to await openings. M. E. Lewis, manager of the Middletown Works, said the furnace's shutdown was part of Armco's long-term modernization plan.
